attributes.action: Stop a law being passed to stop a no deal Brexit.
attributes.background:
Yvette Cooper is trying to stop no deal Brexit through putting a law through the house of commons.

MP's voted for article 50 to be triggered which has the default position of a no deal Brexit. They are now going back on their word.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because Parliament has already passed a Bill to require the Government to seek an extension to Article 50.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
